alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Callahan and southeastern Shackelford Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Putnam, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baird, Moran, Putnam, Rowden, Atwell, Ibex, Mccarty Lake, Admiral, Us-283 Near The Callahan-Shackelford County Line and I- 20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 303 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
